DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : Primary Objectives - To investigate safety tolerability single ascend dos AZP- 531 healthy volunteer . - To investigate safety tolerability single multiple ascend dos AZP-531 overweight/obese volunteer . - To investigate safety tolerability single multiple ascend dos AZP-531 patient type 2 diabetes mellitus . Secondary Objectives • To determine plasma pharmacokinetic ( PK ) profile AZP-531 single multiple dos . Exploratory Objectives • To obtain exploratory data effect AZP-531 pharmacodynamic ( PD ) marker blood glucose , interstitial glucose , insulin , plasma acylated ghrelin ( AG ) unacylated ghrelin ( UAG )
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate AZP531 Healthy Volunteers , Overweight/Obese Volunteers Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Part A : Healthy male volunteer , age 18 50 year ( inclusive ) body mass index ( BMI ) 20 28 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) . Part B : Female ( nonchildbearing potential ) male overweight/obese volunteer , age 18 65 year ( inclusive ) BMI 28 38 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) . Part C : Female ( nonchildbearing potential ) male patient confirm diagnosis type 2 diabetes mellitus least 3 month Part A : Females male volunteer smoke and/or use nicotine product within 6 month screen exclude . Part B : Current exsmokers smoke history great 10 pack year ( 1 pack year = 20 cigarette smoke per day 1 year ) clinically significant abnormality physical examination , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , clinical chemistry , haematology , coagulation urinalysis result screen admission , judge Investigator . Part C : Current exsmokers smoke history great 10 pack year ( 1 pack year = 20 cigarette smoke per day 1 year ) , clinically significant abnormality attribute type 2 diabetes mellitus physical examination , ECG , clinical chemistry , haematology , coagulation urinalysis result screen admission , judge Investigator , estimate glomerular filtration rate < 40 mL*min1*1.73m2 calculate Modification Diet Renal Disease formula .
